5.title: Flag Guessing Game
desc: A multiplayer game to guess the flag of a country.
Uses Flask and SocketIO for real-time communication.
Uses SQL database to store user details and scores.

4.title: Stock Price Predictor
desc: Developed LSTM-based stock prediction program using Alpha Vantage API for accurate forecasting and informed decision-making.
Utilized advanced techniques, including data scaling, dropout layer, and visualization, to enhance model performance.

3.title: Library Management System
desc: Library Management Web App with Flask.
Implemented features like login, signup, book issue, book return, book search, etc.
Uses SQLite database to store books, user details and other data.

2.title: SecureTalk
desc: A TCP/IP chat client and server using Python.
Options to encrypt messages with a code.
Was used by 8-10 friends for personal communication

1.title: SAP Attedance Bot
desc: Telegram bot to send attendance from the SAP Portal of my university.
Uses python and selenium web scrapping to get data from the SAP Portal.
Currently used by 13 friends to track their attendances.
